section.title: Technology dependencies
section.para: RLS depends on the following GT components:
RLS depends on the following 3rd party software:

listitem.simpara: RDBMS: SQLite*, MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle
ODBC driver: SQLite-ODBC*, MyODBC, psqlODBC, or Oracle

para.emphasis: * The RLS comes installed with and configured to use these components.
